reqs:
Sound Design 308: An introduction to the process of creating sound for theatre, focusing on the technology used in the recording, editing, and playback of music and sound effects.
This course will be taught in the Computer Lab Buchanan B202
This is a WAITLIST section for THTR 308 Section 001. Once you have registered in the waitlist there is no need to contact the Department. Your registration will be switched to the parent section when space becomes available.
description: Audio design and production for theatre and other performance forms.
